timeline.message: Initial impl of new xml parser

Add initial xml serialization support classes

Improve serialization
Add namespace decl pruning support
Add support for missing prefix generation

Fix some failing xml tests
Add initial support for xml equivalency

Support namespace decl at jvm bytecode level

via special casing attribute addition method

Fix unflushed xml stream issue

Output stream does not get all characters as internal buffers of
xml stream was not flushed properly

Support providing default ns at element creation

Allow XMLFactory.createXMLElement() method to provide default ns for
the element being created.
Update xml.clone() operation to new impl
Implement text node merge in sequence append
Remove xml sequence constructor taking array val
Remove XMLItem constructor that take string arg
